items.text: 139kph, back of a length wide of off, he leaves this alone
items.shortText: Rabada to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.preText: Hridoy: "Mushfiqur Rahim features 3 out of top 4 partnership in World cup. Such a valuable batsman for Bangladesh without any doub. "
items.text: 146kph yorker, he jams down on it and keeps it out. Well bowled and well played
items.postText: Sven: "@RG whats the point of holding Rabada back to the last 10 if you have already lost the game before then? Its time to take wickets and get into the tail to slow the run rate down." I'd say they will hold back his last two now.
items.shortText: Rabada to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.preText: Markram back on. Around the wicket
items.text: 87kph, pushed through flat outside off, he gives room to cut but misses
items.shortText: Markram to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: slower and shorter on leg, he's back and working this behind square
items.shortText: Markram to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: off break on off, not much turn, he sits back and punches back to the bowler
items.shortText: Markram to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: short drag down, he steps across and whacks a pull shot over deep square! Bad ball and met by Mithun targeting the short side
items.shortText: Markram to Mohammad Mithun, SIX runs

items.text: tossed up and smoked along the ground straight! It was hammered past Markram and he couldn't stop the bullet!
items.shortText: Markram to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: a little lap sweep to a full toss but didn't get it fine enough to beat short fine leg on the circle
items.shortText: Markram to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.preText: Morris back on. He has four overs left
items.text: 133kph, short ball, gets a little big but he controls the pull well enough to the sweeper
items.shortText: Morris to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: off cutter slower ball wide of off, he tries a front foot cut but misses
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: 137kph, good length, top of off, he defends with soft hands to the gap at cover-point for a single
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: 136kph, high short ball, he pulls with control in the air behind square into the gap for a couple. Well placed
items.shortText: Morris to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: 133kph, back of a length, angled in, he tries to turn to leg, gets a slight leading edge to cover but it is along the ground
items.shortText: Morris to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: 137kph, short ball, he swivels and pulls but straight to fine leg
items.postText: Markram and Duminy have bowled the six overs needed to cover Ngidi who won't bowl again due to a hamstring injury
items.shortText: Morris to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: leg break, tossed up, he pushes on the front foot to cover
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: drifting into leg stump, he works this forward of square to the sweeper
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.preText: Bangladesh are ahead of where England were at the same stage on Thursday and England made 311
items.text: drifting into leg, he works it against the turn through forward square
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: played on! He was wiping across the line with with a big slog sweep and was bowled off the inside edge! Clever bowling. It was the top spinner, Mithun was playing for the leg break, he lifted the hit trying to launch it over deep midwicket, and it went off the inside edge onto leg stump.
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mohammad Mithun, OUT

dismissal.text: Mohammad Mithun  b Imran Tahir 21 (21m 21b 2x4 1x6) SR: 100.00

items.preText: Mahmudullah in with 62 balls left. Slip in
items.text: leg break tossed up, he drives firmly to long off
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: short and wide, he's back and cutting to deep point
items.postText: Gururaj: "If SA manage to keep it under 350, they would have done a great job from here on. It's time for the experienced QDK and Faf to step up with the bat and lead the way! "
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Five men out for the last 10 overs
items.text: shorter outside off, he checks a pull shot, bouncing it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: With 10 overs left, ESPNcricinfo's forecaster suggests Bangladesh will get up to 323. It's come down a tiny bit thanks to the Shakib and Mithun wickets
items.text: shorter ball, he is back and pulling to fine leg
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: 135kph, back of a length and it zips through wide of off, he tries to cut but misses. Beaten for pace
items.shortText: Morris to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: good lifting bouncer, he sways underneath it to let it pass outside off
items.shortText: Morris to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: 134kph, good length outside off, he sits back and steers this to backward point
items.shortText: Morris to Mahmudullah, no run
